attributes.action: Overturn Johnson's Decision on Gary McKinnon Extradition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British Public, ask the government to overturn Home secretary Johnson's discision, and refuse extradition.

We the British Public, have been sold out on many occasions by our own Government.

We need our government to stick up and defend our citizens.

Who runs our country, British Government or the Americans?

This crime can be prosecuted in the UK on compassionate grounds.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. In addition, the decision to extradite was made by the courts. The Home Secretary has said it would be illegal for him to intervene.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
